title: Endless Trivia
about: Endless Trivia is an application made for trivia enthusiasts who are looking for a challenge, students looking to study a specific topic and people who like to pass time with quizzes.

title: Stock Simulator
about: With use of real-time APIs, Stock Simulator allows an investor to practice buying and selling stocks without risking real money.

title: The Tech Blog
about: CMS-style blog using Handlebars.js and Sequelize that allow users to publish their blog posts and comment on other user post.

title: University Management
about: University Management Software for American International University West Africa using PHP/PostgreSQL.

title: Electronic Medical Records (EMR)
about: PowerMD+ is a web based software integrating Practice Management, Patient Management, and Patient Portal for small & medium sized medical practices.
